attributes.title: worst. aPP. EVER
attributes.review:
DO! NOT! DOWNLOAD!
This app stole my chicken,my wife,my wife’s boyfriend and my eighteen children. by any cost do not download this. this app is the SOLE reason me and my wife are getting a divorce. yeah you heard that right.Charles if your out there i want to to read this...: I ate the divorce papers, Charles. I ate them with ketchup. You want me to get serious about our divorce? You always called our marriage a joke!  Last week, I asked why you walked down the aisle with me and you said “for the exercise.” Ha, ha. That’s funny, Charles. I’m laughing, not crying. Ha, ha. I’m laughing because you’re about to give up on a woman who is infinitely lovable.

Just ask Paul who's loved me since eighth grade.  Paul’s sent me over two hundred original love sonnets. Paul may be insane, but I would never ask him to sign his name to a piece of paper promising to just turn off his love. That’s what you’re asking of me. To sign away my right to your brown eyes, to your hands through my hair before bed...

So I’ve written you a sonnet. “Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day? Thou art more lovely and more temperate, rough winds do shake the darling buds of May and...”  I’m not crying. I’m laughing. It’s all a big joke. I didn’t write that sonnet. Paul did. I think it’s good.

Why did I eat the divorce papers with ketchup?  So I could stomach them!  What I can’t stomach: losing you.

again the application isn’t worth loosing your family over. Stick to other apps.

attributes.title: truly horrifying 😔
attributes.review: this app truly does not pass the vibe check ✋🏼😤 filled with nothing but fake news ❌ and hatred 😖 would give -10000 stars if possible 🙊

attributes.title: This app should be deleted
attributes.review: Okay so first of all when I opened the app and ugly orange popped up on my screen it almost made my heart stop and the app glitches a lot for no reason but I give this a one star rating because this app sucks😢😤

attributes.title: Disgusting🤢🤮 hORRIBLE!
attributes.review: As soon as I clicked on the app it started glitching and then my phone was on 75% and it was on 5% already this app is so bad it ran out of charge it literally tried to run away from Trump. LITERALLY.Then I was scrolling and there was trump naked I saw everything it look bumpy it was a hot Chito except it was not a hot Chito it was just a Chito because it was orange not red. My mom saw it and was rushed to the emergency room to the hospital and when the doctors saw it they passed out my mom almost died because of this app YOU HAVE TO DELETE IT!! I almost lost my mom😰😭😡THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
This is the worst app ever it kept crashing and made my phone die!!! i even felt a little dizzy! THE WORST APP EVER DO NOT DOWNLOAD  😁 IT TOOK 3 hours to download! and only 5 more hours to log in to that orange face. I couldn’t believe my eyes u even have to pay )
$100 to vote for him!!! this is so not okay and when u try to delete it it FORCES you to vote for him anyway!! what a scam!!! THIS APP MADE ME PASS OUT AND MADE MY DOG POOP HIMSELF. DO NOT DOWNLOAD SAFE TIKTOK

attributes.title: this app is smelly
attributes.review: omg so when i opened up the app, this weird demon showed up behind me saying the words “look for the gunmy bear album in stores on november 13 with lots of music, videos, and extras” and tried to stab me -29383838/10 this app will get you killed!!

attributes.title: Horrendous Experience
attributes.review: At first, I thought Big Cheeto Man was THE STUFF. But now, I am completely appalled. I opened the app to see an image of Big Cheeto Man getting a spray tan NAKED. After deleting the app, I went STRAIGHT to the White House. I snatched Big Cheeto Man’s fake tan and DIPPED. Turns out he had ANOTHER fake tan waiting for him. Once again, I took action. I’ll send ya a picture and I’ll see you tomorrow love ya love love you too love you guys too love you merry merry happy merry merry little birthday love you too love you guys merry merry happy merry merry little birthday hope you’re happy to talk to you later I’ll see you tomorrow love you I’ll see ya later I’ll talk to ya later tonight and then I gotta was the night you merry merry happy merry merry little merry merry happy merry merry little merry merry happy merry merry little birthday to you happy merry merry little birthday hope you’re happy to talk to you later tonight and then I’ll send ya a pic and then I send you the email and I’ll see you tomorrow love you merry merry happy merry merry little birthday merry Christmas merry Christmas to you merry Christmas merry Christmas to you merry Christmas merry Christmas to you merry Christmas to all my family and family to all of your life I wanna know how it to you and I’ll send ya a text. Overall, a HORRENDOUS experience.

attributes.title: Do not use!!
attributes.review: Worst app ever. Promotes Racism, sexual assault, pedophilia, lies, and many other devastating things.  So sad.
